title: Sunday School
description: Classes for K-Adult start at 9:30 in the sanctuary.

title: Sunday Worship Service
description: Corporate worship with expository preaching from God's Word.

title: Men's Theology
description: An evening of fellowship and theological discussion. Alternate Tuesdays.

title: Youth Night
description: Grades 7-12 are invited for games, snacks, and Bible study. Alternate Thursdays.

title: Easter Celebration
description: Celebrate the resurrection of Christ with the Covenant Reformed Church family.
